title: The Coffee Bean
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe with a family-friendly atmosphere: shared tables, newspapers, toys and books for children. Owner is accommodating to vegan guests. Vegans could get a burrito with brown rice, beans, tomato sauce, avocado and lime dressing plus salad; salad with house-made hummus and falafel; vegan fried breakfast; raspberry chia slice; chocolate cake; soya milk in coffee and hot chocolate (no extra charge for soya). Let your server know if vegan.
